original_text: Jesus was God's Messiah. A long time ago, many of God's prophets spoke about him. They spoke God's message about what would happen to the Messiah. They said that he would suffer. God has now caused these things to happen.
korean_text: 그러나 하나님이 모든 선지자의 입을 통하여 자기의 그리스도께서 고난 받으실 일을 미리 알게 하신 것을 이와 같이 이루셨느니라

sentences.original_text: many of God's prophets spoke about him.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 많은 선지자들이 그분에 대해 말했습니다.

sentences.original_text: about what would happen to the Messiah.
They said that he would suffer.
God has now caused these things to happen.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 이제 이 모든 일을 이루셨습니다.
